title: Love's a Game
description: A pop princess. A football star. An unlikely romance that leaves the world on the edge of their seats. Kenzie Tyler is America's sweetheart. From a hometown nobody to an international superstar, she's worked hard to overcome every obstacle in her way, leaving a mess of broken hearts in her wake. Despite her famous love ballads playing on every popular radio station, she never thought she'd find someone to truly sweep her off her feet. But that's all about to change. Nic Bennett is known for his plays both on and off the field. A decorated NFL player, he's at the height of his career, living life to the fullest with no plans to settle down. However, after a kismet connection, it seems those plans are about to go down the drain. Will this unlikely romance surpass both of their wildest dreams? Or will the whole world watching their love on screen cut their love story short? Love's a Game is a standalone popstar x football player romance novella.
author: Kaiden Howell
